channel.title: Let's discuss our favorite tools!
channel.description:
Here is what I use most often these days:
* STM32 Nucleo F411RE development board http://www.st.com/en/evaluation-tools/nucleo-f411re.html * IceStorm + BlackIce II, ICE40 FPGA development board https://www.tindie.com/products/Folknology/blackice-ii/ * BusPirate v4 https://www.seeedstudio.com/Bus-Pirate-v4-p-740.html * Sigrok / PulseView + DSLogic logic analyzer https://www.ebay.com/itm/USB-Logic-DSLogic-Basic-Analyzer-16Ch-100MHz-4Ch-400MHz-Xilinx-Spartan-6-FPGA/182242758729 * Rigol DS1054Z oscilloscope ("overcloked" 100 MHz version) https://www.amazon.com/Rigol-DS1054Z-Digital-Oscilloscopes-Bandwidth/dp/B012938E76 * RTL-SDR v3 https://www.rtl-sdr.com/buy-rtl-sdr-dvb-t-dongles/ * LimeSDR https://www.crowdsupply.com/lime-micro/limesdr
And what are your favorite devices and software?

item.title: Let's discuss our favorite tools!
item.dc:creator: oaktree
item.description:
Hey, have you added them here?

Your Complete, Un-budgeted Toolkit [Wiki] Wiki
Imagine this: You’re a pentester. A long-lost relative has left you a fortune in his will. To keep the money, you have to fulfill just one wish: spend it all on tech (from Amazon, because then you’d be buying a beer or some server time for 0x00sec while still getting some cool stuff for yourself). If you have a good idea for some machine (from a teensy or PLC to a multi-tonne gadget), put it down below. complete with a link: Hardware Communications (New) Bus Pirate 3.6A Aardvark I2C/SPI Host…

Read full topic

item.title: Let's discuss our favorite tools!
item.dc:creator: afiskon
item.description:
Here is what I use most often these days:

  • STM32 Nucleo F411RE development board http://www.st.com/en/evaluation-tools/nucleo-f411re.html
  • IceStorm + BlackIce II, ICE40 FPGA development board https://www.tindie.com/products/Folknology/blackice-ii/
  • BusPirate v4 https://www.seeedstudio.com/Bus-Pirate-v4-p-740.html
  • Sigrok / PulseView + DSLogic logic analyzer https://www.ebay.com/itm/USB-Logic-DSLogic-Basic-Analyzer-16Ch-100MHz-4Ch-400MHz-Xilinx-Spartan-6-FPGA/182242758729
  • Rigol DS1054Z oscilloscope (“overcloked” 100 MHz version) https://www.amazon.com/Rigol-DS1054Z-Digital-Oscilloscopes-Bandwidth/dp/B012938E76
  • RTL-SDR v3 https://www.rtl-sdr.com/buy-rtl-sdr-dvb-t-dongles/
  • LimeSDR https://www.crowdsupply.com/lime-micro/limesdr

And what are your favorite devices and software?

Read full topic
